data.title: Watch List: 150 names to know in NC boys soccer for 2024
data.meta_description: HighSchoolOT is previewing the upcoming boys soccer season with its annual watch list. This year's watch list features 25 names from each of the state's six area codes.
data.text:
HighSchoolOT is previewing the upcoming boys soccer season with its annual watch list. This year's watch list features 25 names from each of the state's six area codes.

HighSchoolOT is previewing the upcoming boys soccer season with its annual watch list.

This year's watch list features 25 names from each of North Carolina's six area codes.

To get ready for the season, also visit the links below from our ongoing boys soccer coverage.

Boys Soccer Recruiting Tracker

Preseason Statewide Top 25 Rankings

Preseason Area Code Top 15 Rankings

Historical HSOT All-State Teams and Final Rankings

Last year's 4A championship story, photos, & highlights (South Mecklenburg over Apex Friendship)

Last year's 3A championship story, photos, & highlights (First Flight over Hickory)

Last year's 2A championship story, photos, & highlights (Franklin Academy over CSD)

Last year's 1A championship story, photos, & highlights (Gray Stone Day over Hobbton)

The players are listed by their team's alphabetical order with last year's stats.
